name: Pauls Awakening
description:
Explore this dungeon as Paul the bald treasure hunter, find the treasure to end the game

Controls

-WASD for movement

Assets

Link to the character used in the game, the creator also has other free assets I highly recomend 

Character pack https://creatus.itch.io/creatus-pirate

Creator of character asset pack https://creatus.itch.io/

Download instructions

-Download zip to computer and then unzip

-Click on exe and enjoy
